title.narrative: Support to Womankind partner organisations in 14 countries to implement programmes that promote and protect women's rights

description.narrative: Womankind supports women's rights organisations in 14 countries to implement programmes that support survivors of violence, prevent violence against women and girls, and strengthen women's participation. Unrestricted funding from DFID is used to fund specific programmes, support partner organisation's core operating costs, and provide match funding for other grants, according to the specific country context;

mailing-address.narrative: Development House, 56-64 Leonard St London, EC2A 4LT
